snippet.title: Trotmania (1.80) - Rhythm is Magic [Full song list]
snippet.description:
Read the Description down below, thanks!





Since I got nothing better to do until somewhere hires me for a job, I got most of the song recorded for the first project of Trotmania. This is the full songlist as of the 1.80 patch, which (should) be the final update to this mod.

These aren't exactly high quality, I just aim to show off how a particular chart looks like and if this would
be passible enough, then well at least I did the job right. I try to show it at it's base form as best as
possible, even down to the .avi files if the file has it (But they are formatted to reduce Framedropping.)

Want the full experience instead? Head over to their Blogspot/ ZIv threads, and support them by downloading
their product! The links will be provided at the very end of the description. 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

"Lirodon first started the development thread for the TrotMania pack on the community site Zenius -I- Vanisher in December 2011, 
promising a StepMania 5 theme and a full song pack containing only music and remixes related to My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. 
While there were many naysayers (primarily those who doubted the legitimacy of the brony fandom to begin with), the project started off 
slowly, but only really got a boost when RIME was named co-chair of development for the pack. After hard work, some drama, and other 
complexities, the team celebrated Nightmare Night in style with the official release of the first edition."

This section is subjected to change over time.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Stepmania 5 Beta 2 is the version being used, HOWEVER the stock theme for this version, only Stepmania Alpha 2 is supported.
The songs themselves can be played on another version of Stepmania, or even something like oITG.

All you need for this version of Trotmania is hosted here:
http://zenius-i-vanisher.com/v5.2/viewsimfilecategory.php?categoryid=751

This is their Blogspot.

http://trotmania.blogspot.com/
